title: Skin Preview
body:
I plan to use Skin Preview in custom games, and I was wondering if I would get banned for it. I appreciate any feedback!
      {{champion:245}}

replies.body: It's always good to refer to our general [**Third Party Applications FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848) when dealing with questions like these. If the program alters gameplay or unlocks certain content for free, there's a decent chance you could be banned.
